title: Suzuki Motorcycle drives in all new V-Strom SX tagged at Rs 2.11 lakh
description: Suzuki Motorcycle India on Thursday said it has launched a 250cc sports adventure tourer V-Strom SX in the India market priced at Rs 2.11 lakh (ex-showroom, Delhi). The introduction marks the company's foray into the 250cc sports adventure tourer segment.
